storyInfo: The two sides in the standoff lay down their weapons, and the parade arrives at Court Square without incident. Lappland hands her mask to Texas, who wins their bet. Leontuzzo arrives at the scene, escorted by Demetri, and gives the closing address.

attributes.content: Cazzo! I said, on my order, you idiot!
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: I-It wasn't me! I only just pulled the safety on my gun—
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: And it's not them, either. See that shocked look on their faces, they're checking themselves for holes...
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: Did someone's weapon go off?
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: No, nobody's hurt... but where did that gunshot come from?
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: I thought I knew what to do just now, but... w-what do we do now?
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: I can see the head of the first float already...
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: ...Hey, you over there.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: <p=2>Three minutes ago</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: *Cough*—Gah—
Two hundred meters... just two hundred...
Haven't lost your touch, Ingrid... not one bit...
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Merda, it hurts... I can feel my blood flow out of me... but that means I still have time...
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Get out of this alley, get back to the square, and I can still bring things under control...
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: We have the courthouse and the port...
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Maybe I'll die, but... *cough*... before I die, I'll sit in the judge's chair, and deliver the final judgment of... *cough*... this ridiculous testing ground...
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Antonio leans against the wall and does his best to stay upright, wobbling towards the exit.
The alley is dark, and every step takes massive effort.
For some reason, he thinks back to how the guerillas crept through the jungle of Bolívar by night, escaping from the Singas government.
Antonio thinks back to the circles that the noble drunkenly drew on the list, and his severed head when the guerillas cut it off.
He thinks back to Ingrid, Venezia Senior, Leontuzzo, Alberto, Signora Sicilia... all the people he hates.
He will take everything from them. He will draw a big, bloody cross on their names.
It's not over yet—
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: He stops.
He feels the cold metal of gun muzzle pressed to his forehead.
A-Antonio.
attributes.name: Nervous Mafioso

attributes.content: Carle?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I ordered you to get out—
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: W-Who do you think you are to kick me out?!
attributes.name: Nervous Mafioso

attributes.content: You're just the Don's guard tuskbeast, Antonio!
attributes.name: Nervous Mafioso

attributes.content: No matter how hard you try to disguise your ears and tail, you—
attributes.name: Nervous Mafioso

attributes.content: You want to kill me?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: YOU?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Your hands are shaking!
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: You don't know who my enemies are! You don't know what I'm building! You stupid, worthless coglione—
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Carle stares blankly at the lifeless body on the ground. He has never seen such fury as that which is on Antonio's face, even unto death.
It almost seems like it was not the bullet that took Antonio's life, but the fact that it was he, Carle, who fired the bullet.
Antonio's blood seeps through the cracks on the ground, in the shape of a massive, bloody cross.
Hey, you over there.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Eirene?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: It's okay.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Before everybody's eyes, Eirene leaves the drivers' line and takes two steps forward, standing in the middle of the road.
Facing off the tense crowd of mafiosi, she takes a deep breath, and lowers her crossbow.
What is the meaning of this?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Look. The first float has rounded the corner...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: The parade is here. Are we really going to fight to the death in front of hundreds of thousands of Nuova Volsinii citizens?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Whatever your plan was, it's too late, isn't it?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: You want us to lower the weapons?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: You think we're stupid?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: We're doing the same thing.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: The White Wolf scattered this stuff on the plaza. We, as conscientious citizens of Nuova Volsinii, volunteered to clean up the square so that the parade can pass through.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: That's what happened, no more, no less. All of you Signori and Signore are witnesses for me and all the drivers behind me.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: They, in turn, are your witnesses.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: It's Carnevale, after all. Let's give the parade a warm, proper welcome.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: *Pant*—*pant*—
attributes.name: Nervous Mafioso

attributes.content: Get in, Carle.
The parade is almost here. We can't park here for long.
There's a Carnevale mask on the driver's seat. Put it on and hide that blood on your face.
D-Don Venezia.
attributes.name: Nervous Mafioso

attributes.content: Move.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: The car starts moving, and the parade crowd passes through behind.
Music and cheering mingle under the bright lights. It has been a good four or five hours since the revelry started, but Nuova Volsinii's excitement shows no sign of abating.
From the expansion plate, through all of Nuova Volsinii's major districts, the procession is about to arrive at its destination. Nobody notices a lone car driving in the opposite direction.
I'm sorry, D-Don Venezia, I didn't get the job done.
attributes.name: Nervous Mafioso

attributes.content: You gave me a chance after Antonio ran me out, ordered me to take him out quietly, but I...
attributes.name: Nervous Mafioso

attributes.content: If Ingrid didn't already mortally wound him before I got there...
attributes.name: Nervous Mafioso

attributes.content: No, Antonio died by your hand.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: The Don's permission is required for the execution of a formal associate of the familglia. At minimum, a proper explanation should be given to important members of the famiglia.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Ingrid's methods were not... decent.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Understood, sir.
attributes.name: Nervous Mafioso

attributes.content: But now, Antonio is dead... he was your son-in-law, the famiglia's—
attributes.name: Nervous Mafioso

attributes.content: Nuova Volsinii has its rules. So does Venezia.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: What Anton did was wrong. This is an act of kindness. He is with Bella now.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Besides, his death will not be meaningless.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: What next, sir?
attributes.name: Nervous Mafioso

attributes.content: We go home and clean the house.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: The first thing that City Hall and the courts will see when they get up in the morning tomorrow is Venezia's good faith. We will sit down together, and we will talk like decent people.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: It will be a busy night.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Keep up, keep up! Court Square is just ahead! We got to get ahead of that float to get a good place—
attributes.name: Carnevale Participant A

attributes.content: Well, don't squeeze!
attributes.name: Carnevale Participant B

attributes.content: You're not joining them, Signorina?
attributes.name: Photographer

attributes.content: Your plain outfit stands out in a crowd of colorful costumes and masks! What an idea, to turn things on its head.
attributes.name: Photographer

attributes.content: May I take a few photos? I can mail them to you if you give me an address.
attributes.name: Photographer

attributes.content: Hey, are you listening?
attributes.name: Photographer

attributes.content: Agnese?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Why don't you say anything, Agnese?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: You've never left me before... where are you?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: The Lupo girl's eyes harden.
The photographer gazes across the street. The red hood stands out in the crowd, even in this revelry.
A trap? How did you—
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: You got distracted.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Is Agnese your grandma? You can't find your grandma too?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: You're the last one. The last true wolf.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Kill you, and I will know the answer.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Grandma?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I'm here, child.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: I won, grandma.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I saw it.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: I saw how the entire battle played out. How you zeroed in onto the Fang of Agnese, lured her into a trap, and struck her down with a single blow.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: You can see? Have your eyes healed, Grandma?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Have your arms grown back? Is your heart whole again? Why... why can't I see you? Why can't I get close to you?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: My sweet child, would you have hunted with such fervor if I didn't say that?
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: Red killed the true wolf and earned an insipid victory for grandma. Finally.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: Now I go off to find another sweet child.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: You lied to me?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Why? I don't understand.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Oh, bother.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: Alright, let me put it another way. Maybe then you'll know what to do.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: You're like the ones you killed, my child.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: You're both huntress and true wolf.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: Not all the true wolves have been slain. Grandma hasn't been saved yet.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: (Claps)
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Look at the coordination of the two groups! Truly impressive, isn't it?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: In the space of a few minutes, they've hidden all the weapons in the trucks, and stand side-by-side to welcome the parade procession. It's almost like they rehearsed it.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Who would believe me if I said they were pointing weapons at each other just a few minutes ago?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You win again, Texas!
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Once again, justice and conscience have taken your side!
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Texas does not answer. The White Wolf claps even harder, an ink-black mask on her face.
Actually, I'm more curious why you suddenly put that mask on.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: It's Carnevale, after all!
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Why the long face, Texas? You won. You should be more cheerful than that.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Look! The parade enters Court Square. That little intermezzo just now never turns into a full-scale riot. Peace and love for all.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Or is it because you just can't help thinking that the only reason it turned out this way was because of a single gunshot out of nowhere, which gave one of the wolves the chance to cool its head?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And Carnevale is nothing but a red carpet laid out on a swamp?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What are you trying to say, Lappland?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What happened tonight is not the same as the civil disorder that happened in the other cities of Siracusa.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: ...The only difference being the involvement of a bunch of ordinary people, who were pushed to desperation by the mafia's turf wars.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Well... you're not wrong.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But they really did put on a remarkable show.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Especially that driver lady that we saw in court, who seems to have understood a lot of things without having to be taught...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Nuova Volsinii is not a vineyard where you just sow the seeds and wait for the fruits to grow.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Don't forget that it sits right in the middle of this swamp by the name of Siracusa.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The famiglie have never been the only ones who had to crawl through mud and water. Don't underestimate the power of this bog, Texas. It turns everyone into hungry, ravenous wolves.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: It has ingrained into the genes of the Siracusans the instinct to turn any new turf into the same swamp.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: This endless cycle is what Siracusa is.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Don't try to escape it or change it. The easiest thing to do is to learn to enjoy the swim.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: This is what the old man, Signora Sicilia, and you... what all of you have taught me.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Leontuzzo and Lavinia have taken radical measures in order to validate an order that exists outside the mafia... there is a long way to go.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But this is why Nuova Volsinii exists. It offers a new possibility.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But really, did you do all this in order to give this speech?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I didn't know you were so concerned about the future of Siracusa.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Took the words right out of my mouth, didn't you? I was going to ask you that.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Otherwise, why would you have come here all the way from Lungmen the moment you got my invitation?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I know, you're gonna say—
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The White Wolf pauses, clears her throat, and imitates Texas' way of speaking.
Calm and even, yet emotion-filled.
Ahem. 'All those lofty ideals are none of my business. I just work for a logistics company.'
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: 'I'm just here because I care about my friend, and because my conscience wouldn't let me turn a blind eye to certain things... just like in Volsinii...'
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: No, Texas, I haven't forgotten the time that we first met...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You had just came to Siracusa. You were standing at the edge of the mobile platform, holding your Nonno Salvatore's hand, watching my family's workers trim the grapevines.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Your nonno and my father were talking about how Columbia was turning into a dump, about Siracusa's good weather, the new year's harvest, and how you'll be staying a while at our place.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Your eyes were BRIGHT back then, and your expressions were much more interesting than they are now—
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: That's because the grapes you picked were so sour they almost burned a hole in my tongue.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Everyone on the square is wearing a mask tonight, but none could compare to the one you wear.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Nobody sees things clearer than you. You were the first one to realize that this is a swamp that you needed to get out of.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But it was your disappointment that made you see, Texas. You once had such high hopes for this swamp.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Forget about my speech. You, Texas, are a true blue idealist!
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I don't deny it.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Or rather, whether I am or am not makes no difference.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: It doesn't change what I have to do at the end of the day.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: A very Texas answer. Almost boringly so.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Is that a LANDSHIP?!
attributes.name: Curious Passerby

attributes.content: Wow, City Hall brought a landship to the show and turned it into a stage?
attributes.name: Curious Passerby

attributes.content: Wait, look who's on deck...
attributes.name: Excited Passerby

attributes.content: Is that the Last Texas?
attributes.name: Excited Passerby

attributes.content: I'm sure, I've seen her in the courts of Volsinii—and the one opposite her...
attributes.name: Curious Passerby

attributes.content: Lappland? The White Wolf who was disowned by the Don of Saluzzo eight years ago?
attributes.name: Excited Passerby

attributes.content: Why are they here at the Carnevale?
attributes.name: Curious Passerby

attributes.content: Must be City Hall's special guests! Think about it, representatives of two major famiglie here at the climax of Carnevale...
attributes.name: Excited Passerby

attributes.content: It sends an even more powerful message than Signor Bellone's promotional video!
attributes.name: Excited Passerby

attributes.content: Damn right!
attributes.name: Curious Passerby

attributes.content: Lappland takes off her mask and gives it to Texas.
What?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You won the bet, didn't you?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: In the old days, the famiglie murdered each other on Carnevale, the last surviving wolf taking the masks of the vanquished.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I suppose we need to give the old customs new meaning in this new city... a new life, that kind of stuff, I guess.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: As for the question just now, it doesn't matter what your answer is.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Siracusa makes all of us wear masks, after all.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: We're part of Carnevale's main event, Texas.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Regardless of why you're here, here and now, you represent part of Siracusa, whether it's the part that's new, or the part that's broken and needs to be thrown out.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Mafiosi and truck driver, city officials and judges, and all the Siracusans on the square, will see in us the meaning that they want to see.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You may, of course, choose to turn around and leave.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Come on, Texas, don't just stand there. All of Nuova Volsinii is watching!
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Silence.
Texas gazes at her old friend, and old enemy, for a long time... and finally extends her hand.
A dozen beast floats drive into Court Square, as though it had been previously rehearsed, and the reveling crowd continues to gush in like the tide.
The sound of music and the cheers of the crowd keeps growing louder. The bright lights and fireworks in the sky provide the perfect backdrop for the duo on stage.
Do you hear that? They would not let the good night go gently.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: They're cheering for you and me, for this new city, for a new life.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You're still really good at making me feel sick.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'll take that as a compliment.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But I don't mind being part of the event. I don't mind these people seeing some sort of 'meaning' in me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Without hope, there would never be disappointment. Whether in Columbia or Siracusa, I do, in fact, hope to see a truly vibrant city emerge from the swamp.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: If the challenge and complexity of building it are beyond what I can imagine, then I will face the challenge with my friends, not run away from it.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Alright, I've made up my mind. I'll take care of one more trouble for you and Siracusa!
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I'm bringing those stupid wolves back to the wilderness, so that Siracusa won't be affected by their dumb game.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: No need to thank me. But when the obstacles have all been pushed out of the way, how will they—you—change this swamp?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: There's something I suddenly wanted to ask you, Texas.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Are you disappointed that I didn't come to Nuova Volsinii for you?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Another very Texas answer.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Break a leg, Texas.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Mm-hm.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Texas takes the mask.
The White Wolf lets go, without warning, without hesitation. She turns around and walks into the landship's hold.
Oh, and Texas?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You were fun while it lasted.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Landship, the White Wolf of Saluzzo and Texas, and the Truckers' Union...
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: What else did we miss?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: S-Signor Bellone...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Hello, Eirene. Haven't seen you in a while.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Perhaps we should have a little chat once the festivities are over.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Go on, Mayor Leontuzzo.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The duo's performance has come to an end. Time to deliver the closing speech for Carnevale.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Thanks for bringing me here, Demetri. And sorry I couldn't give you a satisfactory answer even at the very end.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Since when have you been the type to say useless crap like that?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: ...I suppose you're right.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Good evening, folks. I'm Leontuzzo.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: As you can see, I was a little dinged up, but I'm out of the woods now.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I was actually there in the middle of the parade on the way to Court Square, experiencing this city that we live in together.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I'm sure little needs to be said about the impressive performance of Signorine Lappland and Texas.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But I wanted to see your faces, say a few things, and spend the night together with you guys.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Many things have changed in Nuova Volsinii over the past year, not least the completion of the Nuova Volsinii Port, the biggest cargo port in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Every connection it makes is like a pulse of the city, demonstrating healthy, robust vitality, supporting thousands of enterprises and hundreds of thousands of livelihoods.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: We founded the country's first police academy, a new code of laws, and people are increasingly identifying with Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: This makes me glad and anxious in equal measure.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The city continues to face many problems that cannot be ignored. For example, the citizen credit system remains inconvenient, and there are many cases where it doesn't achieve its intentions.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: We also understand that the uniqueness of New Urban Management Act makes it difficult for our citizens to receive the support they need for cases that span jurisdictions.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: A year is a very short period of time. City Hall and the courts still have much to do.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: What I want to ask is this: What is Nuova Volsinii to you?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: That's also the question that I want to ask other Siracusans in Volsinii, Sicilia, Montelupe... what is Nuova Volsinii to them?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And what is this young city to neighboring Leithanien, distant Ursus, and all the other countries in Terra, for which change is a constant?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Are we a new possibility to them? Not just a different kind of violence, but something stronger, firmer, more close-knit, something worth talking to?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Will they understand that our strength comes from our most earnest desires, that we, and all the others gathered here today, can safeguard our hard-earned new lives?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: That's what we have been trying to achieve over the past year.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: There is no famiglia in Nuova Volsinii. The reforms associated with this saying doesn't rely on 'Siracusan' methods, as Siracusans know it—
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: A secret negotiation, an assasination in the dark, a purge of the city, a deadly struggle between famiglie...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: All that has happened here, and all that will happen, will be viewed through the lens of the law.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: We're giving a new order to our new life. The swamp that Siracusans used to take for granted will no longer faze us.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: A friend once said to me that I'm walking down a thorny path.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: He's right. But all the challenges that we have faced is exactly why Nuova Volsinii must continue to move forward.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: For everyone who has been hurt on this path, for everyone who may be hurt in the future, I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But at the same time, I continue to extend an invitation to all the friends who have something to ask of Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: We shall trample the thorns together and make this brand-new, one-of-a-kind city better, little by little, until it's ready to usher in a new era.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: As a matter of fact, a new era for Siracusa has already begun, a future filled with infinite possibilities.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Demetri gazes forward silently, at the silhouette of Leontuzzo outlined by the countless lights.
What can I say, Leon?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Saluzzo's wine isn't bad, but I prefer my own.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Bellone will find its way into this city, in my way, by your rules.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I promise that to you.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Demetri turns around.
The mayor's speech continues, but he has received the answer he was looking for. Demetri has accepted the invitation, or perhaps, the declaration of a very long war.
Enjoy the rest of the night!
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And, the dawn of a new day.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo
